(b) To return: you observe that, through- out His earthly life, Jesus was quite well aware that He was different from all other men. He claimed to be apart, and acted always with a certain aloofness He never put Himself on a level with even His closest disciples Never even in the moments when they were nearest to one another, did Jesus suggest or allow thern to suppose that He and they were in one case.
